value.title: StarCraft 2: AMAZING Widow Mine Connections! (Cure vs Rogue)
value.excerpt: Best-of-5 series of professional StarCraft 2 between Cure and Rogue. This series starts off with normal build orders, but quickly evolves to something much greater as both players test a variety of strategies.  Match is from the OlimoLeague December finals. Support OlimoLeague on Patreon here: https://www.patreon.com/olimoley

value.title: StarCraft 2: BEAUTIFUL STARCRAFT! (Dark vs Cure)
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series of top level StarCraft 2 between the current World Champion Dark and the strongest up-and-coming player Cure. A sick series of Zerg versus Terran where both players play what is considered to be a classical style of StarCraft 2 focused around Marine Marauder Medivac and Mutalisks Zerglings

value.title: StarCraft 2: REYNOR PLAYING PROTOSS?! (Bly vs Reynor)
value.excerpt: Since there are not a lot of big offline tournaments on the horizon, a few SC2 pro gamers have decided to rank up their offraces over the last week or two in StarCraft 2. In the case of Reynor, one of the best Zerg players in the world, he has been playing a significant amount of Protoss and also Terran.
